■ 1,200 Red Crystals + Bonuses (7 days)
Bonus 1: Stamina Boost Active - Battle Rewards x4 (Originally x3), x8 (Originally x6), x12 (Originally x9)
Bonus 2: More Gil Shop Free Refills +3

■ 480 Red Crystals + Bonuses (7 days)
Bonus 1: Added Co-op Battle Rewards
Bonus 2: Synthesis Time Reduction -30%
Bonus 3: Chocobo Expedition Rare Drop Rate +30%
Bonus 4: Chocobo Expedition Time Reduction -30%

<color=#9DB2CC>*The effects of "Bonus 1: Added Co-op Battle Rewards" are shared with other players in the same lobby.</color>

■ 3,000 Red Crystals + Bonus (7 days)
Bonus: Special Mission - Receive Stamina Tonic x20 per Day

- 4,500 Blue Crystals
